data.description:
In Monkey Terror, players take on the role of a monkey or human trapped in a maze of dark, decaying rooms within an abandoned building. The environment is suffocating and eerie, with broken furniture, peeling wallpaper, and flickering lights casting shadows that seem to move on their own. Every creak of the floorboards and distant footstep adds to the unsettling atmosphere.

As players explore the twisting corridors, they uncover strange symbols and remnants of mysterious rituals. The building holds countless secrets, with hidden doors and rooms full of puzzles that must be solved to progress. Some rooms contain traps or eerie objects that react to the playerâ€™s movements, further heightening the tension.

The deeper players go, the more they encounter supernatural entities that stalk them through the maze. These twisted spirits appear suddenly and move unpredictably, creating terrifying chase sequences. Whether the player relies on the monkey's agility or the human's resourcefulness, they must navigate these encounters to survive.

The line between reality and the paranormal blurs as the game builds psychological tension, with every sound and shadow potentially hiding danger. In this immersive VR world, the player is constantly on edge, struggling to escape a building that seems alive with malevolent forces, amplifying the sense of terror at every turn.
